programme.title: TSUKIMICHI -MOONLIT FANTASY- #1
programme.desc: Misumi Makoto is summoned to the otherworld to become a hero, but the Goddess there hates him and exiles him.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a morticians ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yangs employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friends son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Everyone wants to win the annual Lion Dance Trophy, including Wong Fei Hung. His jealous rivals, led by Master Shen, try to frame Wong by placing a decomposed corpse in his Po Chi Lam clinic. This gives Lu Wei, a corrupted cop, the chance to pile Wong Fei Hung with various criminal charges. Will Wong be able to defeat his enemies once again?

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend’s grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua) , Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) .

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with Venoms” Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World’s intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of Money, Sex And Love, this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the Killer Doctor, in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guos household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan (Chang Chan-peng) is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai (Alexander Fu Sheng) . The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific (Nat Chen Pai-chiang) . Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou (Wang Yu) .

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The Venoms were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one venom and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu schools students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke) , Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the directors best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, bloody good entertainment!

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The Venoms were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one venom and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu schools students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke) , Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the directors best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, bloody good entertainment!

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders, it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shihs magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Buddhas Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddhas Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua) , a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wangs exorcist sister (Hsia Ping) , who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read Mays fortune.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chans long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Desert Car Kings(S1):Pontiac Gto
programme.desc: The McClure family and their ragtag crew restore American glory, one classic car at a time.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch(S14):First Blood
programme.desc: Jake strives to become an independent Captain, and Keith offers mentorship, but accusations fly and suspicions grow as the captains plunge head first into a brutal start.

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out(S3):Behind The Scenes Special
programme.desc: This special behind the scenes episode will reveal how Eds quest for constant improvement is a lifelong endeavour.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters(S5):Episode 5
programme.desc: The Cheals are hit with massive machinery failure as Rory busts their digger underground, and the Tarantos excavator grinds to a halt at the bottom of their mine.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral(S2):Brazen Bandits
programme.desc: In Texas, a band of robbers is dubbed the inchworm bandits when cameras catch them crawling across floors. In New York, a dognapper looks straight into the lens.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral(S2):Terrified For Their Lives
programme.desc: A violent robbery puts a store clerks life in danger. A young woman is stalked in her own home by an intruder, and theres a frightening confrontation.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown(S3):Journey To The Ice Age
programme.desc: Josh Gates treks deep into Siberia where priceless mammoth bones are mined out of the permafrost.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch(S14):Clash Of Kings
programme.desc: Jake makes a devils bargain, huge crab for hidden perils, until his boat itself is on the line.

programme.desc: The hunt for alien life continues in Zimbabwe, where Josh interviews witnesses from one of the largest UFO sightings in modern history.

programme.desc: Josh Gates dives into one of Americas oldest witch stories. In the Tennessee backwoods, locals report being attacked in a vast cave system.

programme.desc: Budaixi (cloth bag drama) emerged in Fujian Province around 300 years ago and was carried to Taiwan by Han migrants.

programme.title: Sacred Sites S2 #6
programme.desc: Hitler was convinced Aryans from the mythological land of Atlantis founded great civilizations across the world. To prove his theory, a special SS division called the Ahnenerbe was formed to carry out archaeological investigations at ancient sites.

programme.title: Aerial America #1
programme.desc: Buckle up for a spectacular flight along the famous Pacific Coast Highway and over iconic landmarks such as Hearst Castle and the Golden Gate Bridge. Soar above beaches and wine country, across Big Sur redwoods, and into the heart of California.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #3
programme.desc: Miami is not just close to Cuba in proximity but the real Cuban food here is plentiful. We meet the Cubans who know the real Cuba and find out how their life here in Miami is so sweet.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #4
programme.desc: It is estimated that as many as 4.5 million Irish arrived in America between 1820 and 1930. They left their mark on the founding formation of America and we find out more about their history as we eat their food.

programme.title: The Wine Show S2 #4
programme.desc: James Purefoy and Matthew Goode find themselves in stunning Burgundy on the hunt to each find a wine to match the main course in their epic six course lunch. With Coq aux Vin on the menu, it’s the only place to be.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 #4
programme.desc: From Avocado, Truffles, Macadamia to Vanilla, the stunning Bay of Plenty is a growers paradise.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 #5
programme.desc: Ben is in Whanganui where he goes hunting with All Black legend Glenn Osborne before visiting Woodhaven Gardens.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S2 #6
programme.desc: This week, Ben is in Southland where he visits Granity Downs then tries to perfect the art of making Cheese Rolls.

programme.title: Off-Menu #1
programme.desc: As the capital of the Netherlands, Amsterdam is home to a plethora of historic sights and culinary delights. Paris can feel anchored in another time, while a dynamic food scene keeps evolving.

programme.title: Off-Menu #2
programme.desc: In Dublin, verdant fields yield impeccable produce, and the coastal waters offer the finest seafood. Copenhagens food scene caters to all, and it is high quality, locally sourced, and globally inspired.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #1
programme.desc: California has one of the largest populations of Japanese people in America. Their life here and their transition into American culture hasn’t been a smooth one. In this episode we uncover their trials, resilience and delicious healthy food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #2
programme.desc: California was once called Mexico before the United States purchased it. In San Diego we eat the real Mexican food from those who do it best. And we go on a beer tour and taste the best craft beers money can buy.

programme.title: United Plates Of America #3
programme.desc: Miami is not just close to Cuba in proximity but the real Cuban food here is plentiful. We meet the Cubans who know the real Cuba and find out how their life here in Miami is so sweet.

programme.title: Aerial America #2
programme.desc: Join a non-stop journey over America’s most exotic and breathtaking state. Explore lush green cliffs, black-sand beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant city life. From Molokai to Maui, discover the astonishing stories of Hawaiis eight major islands.

programme.title: Baby Animals #5
programme.desc: Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.

programme.title: Baby Animals #6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Baby Animals #7
programme.desc: Follow the staff at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, during the busy spring when moose, boars, raccoons, and visiting Canada Geese have their babies.

programme.title: Wild Wild East #5
programme.desc: The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has travelled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local mil

programme.title: Wild Wild East #6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and Seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East #7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, Beavers and Moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlo

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: ZooMoo's Got Brains S1 #9 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Do you know a lot about animals? Then join us and test your animal knowledge on ZooMoo’s Got Brains a game show like no other! Our host, Rory the Tiger will lead you and the group of enthusiastic contestants through quizzes and mind-boggling riddles that are all about animals!

programme.title: Owl's Fascinating Facts #14 [Eng/Man]
programme.desc: Did you know that an ostrich’s eye is bigger than it’s brain? Or a bombardier beetle shoots boiling poison from its bottom? Join Owl as he uncovers the most amazing, the most extraordinary, the most unbelievable animal behaviour on the planet. Some stories are so strange, you won’t believe your eyes. But they are facts. Fascinating facts.

Fascinating facts.

Dunia: Into A New World #2
programme.desc: Based on a Korean online video game, this survival variety show features a group of celebrities exploring a new world in the land of Dunia. In this unfamiliar world where one false move may result in a devastating outcome, they must learn to adapt, survive and cooperate.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Seas S3 #8
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Hangout with Yoo #94
programme.desc: This popular Korean variety show stars Korea’s most beloved MC Yoo Jae Seok, who comes across as a man of many talents in this entertaining programme. In each episode, celebrity guests join Yoo to perform different tasks and challenges. Hanging out with Yoo will certainly make you laugh very hard!

programme.title: Dunia: Into A New World #3
programme.desc: Based on a Korean online video game, this survival variety show features a group of celebrities exploring a new world in the land of Dunia. In this unfamiliar world where one false move may result in a devastating outcome, they must learn to adapt, survive and cooperate.

programme.title: Run Puppy Run #9
programme.desc: In this variety show, dog-loving celebrities team up with their dogs for the biggest dog agility competition in Korea. The teams show the communication, achievement and emotional bonds between humans and dogs through the process of learning and preparing for the sports challenges.

programme.title: Flying Dragon Leaping Tiger
programme.desc: Lu the horse thief is betrayed by his best mate Qiao and is separated from his son. Lu’s wife blames him for it and takes Qiao’s daughter away as revenge. For 20 years, Lu searches for his wife until one day, his missing son meets Qiao’s daughter and they fall in love. Will their hatred pass on to the next generation?

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Seas S3 #8
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Celebrity BROmance #9
programme.desc: This reality show stars popular Korean boy band members (including V from BTS and Jackson Wang from GOT7) and idol artistes, who bring their true stories to the programme. In each episode, famous celebrities develop their male friendship like ordinary people and reveal their feelings which are not known to fans.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Urban Cops KCSI #6
programme.desc: This reality show returns with four celebrities as rookie detectives joining the Forensic Investigation Unit in Seoul. They work with real-life police officers and share their pride and difficulties in their lives as urban cops. Check out how they deal with urban crimes and carry out forensic investigations to solve cases!

programme.title: Two Cops #1
programme.desc: Cha Dong Tak is a cop with a strong sense of justice. One day on the hunt for a criminal, his body inexplicably gets possessed by the soul of a sleazy swindler Gong Soo Chang. Two antagonistic souls end up in a peculiar crime-solving partnership. Things become more complicated when an impulsive journalist, Song Ji An, joins the investigation.

programme.title: Hangout with Yoo #94
programme.desc: This popular Korean variety show stars Korea’s most beloved MC Yoo Jae Seok, who comes across as a man of many talents in this entertaining programme. In each episode, celebrity guests join Yoo to perform different tasks and challenges. Hanging out with Yoo will certainly make you laugh very hard!

programme.title: Extreme Ends #3

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Bao’s wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yang’s into battle to continue their husband’s legacy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, its now up to Lung to reclaim his masters honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: Dunia: Into A New World #4
programme.desc: Based on a Korean online video game, this survival variety show features a group of celebrities exploring a new world in the land of Dunia. In this unfamiliar world where one false move may result in a devastating outcome, they must learn to adapt, survive and cooperate.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 #2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 #3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 #1
programme.desc: South Africa’s Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa’s big cats.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 #3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, there’s a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 #3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africas Claws Jaws 1 #1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 #2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 #3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 #3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africas Claws Jaws 1 #1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 #1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it’s warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 #2
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it – you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow – but full of monsters.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 #2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 #3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 #3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africas Claws Jaws 1 #1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 #1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it’s warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 #2
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it – you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow – but full of monsters.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 #4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 #5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 #2
programme.desc: From their time as dangerous adversaries to colonialist hunters, who coined the term “the big five, ” to the ever-present and considerable challenges of daily life, for the lion, African elephant, leopard, buffalo, and rhino, life isn’t easy when you’re big in the wild.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 #4
programme.desc: In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 #4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Africas Claws Jaws 1 #2
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While it’s true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Kingdoms 1 #5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Kingdoms 1 #6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape’s protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 #2

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 #3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, there’s a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. programme.title: Winds of September
programme.desc: The winds of September are the wind of Hsinchu, a strong wind that visits the county and city between September and November. Lin Shu-Yus semi-autobiographical debut takes us back to 1996…

programme.title: Chinese Midnight Express II
programme.desc: Wong is the disenchanted warden of a huge prison in 1960s Hong Kong. After a scuffle with the police Wong gets stuck in a jail cell with a gang leader. The two decide to work together to uncover evidence of prison corruption, and try to stay alive in the brutal prison world...

programme.title: Paws Men
programme.desc: Paws-Men tells the story of rescuing dogs, in which Paws-Men encounter many difficulties, such as a dog eatery, bullies and a dog abusing granny. Yet Paws-Men witness true friendships between dogs and humans. This film makes us realize: Saving dogs is not hard. People are the real problem...

programme.title: The Travelling Cat Chronicles
programme.desc: Satoru is a young man with a warm heart. He has a cat named Nana, but, due to circumstances, he cant raise cat Nana anymore. He travels with Nana to find a person who will take care of Nana. During his travels, he meets various people like his childhood friend and his first love. His unknown past and secret are revealed...

programme.title: Always On My Mind
programme.desc: When news anchor Michael Hui discovers he has cancer and only has three months to live, he decides to play it for all its worth on television for big ratings and lots of money.

programme.title: Love Generation Hong Kong
programme.desc: Loosely based on a popular Japanese TV series, Bill Kay, a white collar office worker with no future, who decided to break up with his equally career-less girlfriend Maggie. Six years later Bill becomes a billionaire, with a celebrity gal Joey and a loyal secretary Moon. But then Bill met Maggie by chance in Tokyo and their love is rekindled...

programme.title: The Nikaidos Fall
programme.desc: Tatsuya Nikaido is a middle-aged divorcee who runs an agricultural company and lives in a suburb with his daughter and mother. After his only sons death, he has been pressured by his fate to save his family name and ancestral line as a only male in the family. Tatsuyas daughter Yuko cant help feeling responsible for her familys survival despite her resistance against the traditional mind. The only options left to them to save their family name is either that Tatsuya remarry and have a son, or Yuko marry a man who can take her familys surname as a mukoyoshi (adopted son-in-law) of her father. But they both in love with someone who is not suited for the condition. Tatsuya and Yuko struggle caught in the dilemma between their family obligation and love. Meanwhile, despaired Tatsuyas sickly mother indirectly takes actions for the family survival, which causes increasing tensions around Tatsuya and Yuko.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing (Jackie Chan) is the most decorated and respected officer in the police force. A legend in his time, he leads a team of the brightest young detectives and no case is too tough…

programme.title: Killing Me Tenderly
programme.desc: Singer Cindy Chu was a teenage idol. Her manager Mother received letters that threatened to kill her. The police sent the young and righteous George Lai to protect Cindy by pretending that he was a gay personal assistant. Due to their different roles, funny things happened when they first tried to get along with each other...

programme.title: The Magic Touch
programme.desc: Hui Wai-kuk tells peoples fortunes by feeling their bones. In reality, he is a scam who is able to read minds of others because he has gathered information about them in advance; he is able to make a lot of money. The wife of Commissioner David Ho of the Inland Revenue Department is suspicious that her husband is cheating on her. Hui tells Mrs. Ho the name of the mistress. She then scolds Ho in his office. Ho sends junior assessor Yau Ho-kei to investigate Huis income. Yau does not work seriously, but he wants to stand out. During the investigation, Hui sustains a brain injury causing his coma. After he wakes up, he discovers that he has gained super abilities, being able to feel peoples bones and see their future...

programme.title: Forgive Me Not
programme.desc: Ming Li (Tan Jun Yan) is having financial problem to invest in video art and the production video of his long time model girlfriend called Ya Xi (Lai Ya Yan)…

programme.title: Short of Love
programme.desc: A feature film headlined by ubiquitous and diminutive Hong Kong entertainment personality Wong Cho-Lam. Writer-director James Yuens Short of Love is in some ways a throwback to…

programme.title: My Sweetle
programme.desc: Sammy falls in love with Suet at the first sight in a MRT. One day, to his surprise, Suet is in his office as a newcomer with Strong, Sammys childhood rivals. However…

programme.title: Two Komachis
programme.desc: One of the Angels of Death comes to the Earth in order to take the 25-years-old Komachi. Desperately trying to escape from her unfortunate destiny, the young girl makes up a pregnancy and begs him to deceive the Underworld and take another 25 years-old Komachi, who is friend of hers. Death falls in love with two women and has to come to terms with itself, in this story that takes inspiration from a Japanese classic, here set in a misterious and seductive Hong Kong, shown over the course of decades.

programme.title: Confucius
programme.desc: China is not yet unified in the Spring and Autumn Period. The country-to-be is a patchwork of feudal kingdoms and states, constantly vying with each other for supremacy and territorial advantage. The kingdom of Lu is typical. The ruler of Lu invites Kong Qiu into the court as a trusted adviser, and appoints him the court’s Minister of Rituals.In court, Kong Qiu demonstrates the efficacy of his ethics and his own tactical brilliance by regaining Lu’s control over three cities lost in battle to the Qi kingdom three decades earlier. But Kong Qiu is outmaneuvered by the ruler of Qi, who bribes the ruler of Lu to demote his minister and send him into exile. Kong Qiu sorrowfully leaves his family and begins a new life as a wandering teacher.Kong Qiu and his disciples suffer great hardships as they wander in search of a new home. Ji-Sun Fei finds Kong Qiu and brings a gift from his dying father, a jade ring, symbolizing his unbroken link with his homeland Lu. Kong Qiu agrees to return to Lu, but only as a teacher; he will not involve himself in politics. He is true to his word, and he sees out his days working on his scrolls, editing poems and chronicling history.

programme.title: Were No Bad Guys
programme.desc: Plane (Ekin Cheng), a troubled cop who hits the skids when his girlfriend Carrie (Gigi Leung) gets killed by a stoic hitman named Angel (Alex Fong). One year later he finds himself…

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: The Sunshine courier Wu Jixian works at an express company, he always perfectly finish all tasks with his unique biking stunts every time. One day, on the road of delivering a VIP parcel…

programme.title: Moonlight Express
programme.desc: After fiances death in an car accident, Hitomi moves to Hong Kong to fulfull their previous dream of overlooking the night scenery of Pearl of the East. Bos being a workaholic has broken the heart of his girlfriend who is finally committed suicide. Ka Bo feeling compunction and devotes untill he meets Hitomi...

programme.title: The Tricky Master
programme.desc: Gambler Ferraris help gambling party every weekend at his place to trick pepole for money. Police Chan is assigned as an undercover to investigate the case. However, he is tricked back by Ferraris and is being terminated to investigate the case. In order to take revenge, he collaborates with Wong Si Fu-the king of Gambler to defeat Ferrais...

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: While the world was welcoming for the Beijing Olympic Game, students in Hong Kong were busying to combat with the battle: O-level exam. 9 characters, in their adolescence age, were lost in…

programme.title: Here Comes Fortune
programme.desc: Principal Tams mission is to help a hapless office lady to achieve success in life, but an accident renders him without memories and magic powers. Lam Tze Chung transforms into a 10-year-old girl to reward $100 million to a good-hearted nurse, while Kitty Zhang gives blind pianist something more valuable than gold...

programme.title: Shimane: Emproidered in Tradition

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Georges toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Anna Friends
programme.desc: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Frogas strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna Friends
programme.desc: When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Frogas beloved socks has disappeared. Shes worried its gone forever.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib cant help to control everything.

programme.title: Blues Clues You
programme.desc: Were playing Blues Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
programme.desc: In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mr. Porters delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bays Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagles nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but whos bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofias café, but who is Paddingtons BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Grubers shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Its snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadnt picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbits boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Sesame Street[Eng]
programme.desc: Elmo, Abby, and Cookie Monster are back for more fun than ever before! This season the team takes on playful problem-solving by exploring how you learn! Join the whole Sesame Street gang as they problem-solve by asking themselves, “I wonder,” “what if?,” and saying, “let’s try,” when faced with a problem! They persist, don’t give up, and work through their ideas until they find a solution to their problem!

programme.title: Our Family[Eng]
programme.desc: Our Family is a BAFTA award winning documentary series with integral digital content that celebrates the everyday magic of family life in the UK for 3-7 year olds. Follows the daily lives of young children and their families. Their stories are entertaining, funny, inspiring, sometimes sad – but always filmed from a child’s perspective, telling real-life tales of what it means to be part of family life.

programme.title: Kosmix[Eng]
programme.desc: Kit worked on a launch ramp for space rockets as a maintenance robot, but he always dreamed of roaming around the universe, meeting planets and seeing stars, so one day he screwed himself to a rocket and finally fled to space. Every episode focuses on a different planet or a space object with a simple personality. Kit, our tour guide around the universe, visits them and it always leads to an adventure.

programme.title: The Strange Chores[Eng]
programme.desc: Two teenage wannabe warrior heroes and a high spirited ghost girl master the skills they need to replace the world’s greatest and oldest monster hunter by doing his strange supernatural chores. Yup, turns out “kooky neighbour” Old Man Helsing’s weird house at the end of the street is secretly a portal to supernatural worlds! Charlie and Pierce beg him to reveal it all! Monsters! Goblins! Ghosts! Everything!

programme.title: Justin Time[Eng]
programme.desc: Looking for adventure? Then come along as Justin and his imaginary pals Olive and Squidgy star in the biggest stories of all time, told from every corner of the world! Justin’s imagination catapults him into larger-than-life adventures set in different points in history. Join Justin, Olive and Squidgy in these exhilarating stories to experience how fun, friendship, adventure are timeless!

programme.title: Pearl Magazine[Eng]
programme.desc: People are relocating back to Hong Kong. Those helping returnees to resettle are seeing a 33% increase in business. / Students without top grades are getting a chance to experience studying overseas, inspirating these students to achieve something in life.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan[Eng/Can]
programme.desc: Nara: Discovering Ancient Ways – Michael Rice sets off from Osaka to tackle Japan's steepest road on his way to historic Nara Prefecture, site of the capital 1,300 years ago. He rides through the sacred forest behind Kasugataisha Shrine, brilliant with the colors of fall, to travel to a land teeming with prehistoric burial mounds to visit one in Sakurai. In Uda, he tours a medicinal herb garden to learn about the traditional wisdom of Nara.

programme.title: Season of Love:Sing Street[Eng][PG]
programme.desc: SING STREET takes us back to 1980s Dublin where an economic recession forces Conor out of his comfortable private school and into survival mode at the inner-city public school where the kids are rough and the teachers are rougher. He finds a glimmer of hope in the mysterious and uber-cool Raphina, and with the aim of winning her heart he invites her to star in his band’s music videos.

DISCOVER NEW TAIWAN STEP BY STEP
Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Friendsssss
programme.desc: A student, Sense, returns home to the countryside for a summer vacation and discovers that his friend has gone missing for two years. His lost friend’s girlfriend joins Sense to find him but they are followed by evil spirits along the way and somehow get involved in the mysterious death of some gangsters. Can they eventually find their lost friend?

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Better Off Zed
programme.desc: A lazy thirty-something is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Better Off Zed
programme.desc: A lazy thirty-something is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer.

programme.title: Echoes of Fear
programme.desc: A young girl inherits her grandfather’s house after his sudden death from a heart attack. When she is packing the house, she experiences some paranormal events and begins to suspect the true cause of her grandfather’s death. To find the truth, the frightened girl decides to hunt and face up to the evil spirit hidden in the house...

programme.title: Corpse Party - Book of Shadows
programme.desc: This sequel starts with a group of high school students witnessing a murder at school. One of the students, Naomi, is traumatized and travels back to the haunted school through a spell to see her dead friend. She also finds the ‘Book of Shadow’ which can supposedly resurrect the dead. Can Naomi bring her dead friend back to life?

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Lee believes people who commit suicide will go to hell. After his wife killed herself because of cancer, Lee feels the pain of people with suicidal thoughts and thinks of killing them to bring them to heaven. He then kills the four people from a suicidal website. Despite Lee seeing himself acting upon God’s will, his belief is being challenged.

programme.title: Exorcism: The Haunted Child
programme.desc: Thien Tam and her friends play cruel pranks on young teacher My Lan, who suffers spiritually and physically from the horrifying events. When Thien Tam and her boyfriend kill a pregnant woman and her baby in a car accident, they are haunted by terrifying incidents which turn out to be connected to Thien Tam’s pranks.

programme.title: Model Family #2
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Apartmen
programme.desc: An apartment where a murder has happened is haunted by a series of paranormal incidents and no renter has ever stayed more than 14 days. A young paranormal novelist moves in to the apartment to investigate the case of a headless female ghost and experiences some insanely terrifying events.

programme.title: Ex Girlfriends Ghost
programme.desc: Viki and his wife Angel cast their first film and a talented young girl enrols to approach Viki. Her intention however, is to take revenge on Viki for causing her sister’s death due to depression from being his mistress. Since then, Viki experiences terrifying incidents in his office and Angel soon realizes he had been cheating on her.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before its too late?

programme.title: Zoombies 2
programme.desc: A game ranger and a team of poachers surrounded by zombie animals forge an alliance to stop the creatures before the super-zombie virus spreads to the entire world.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Zoombies
programme.desc: When a strange virus quickly spreads through a safari park and turns all the zoo animals undead, those left in the park must stop the creatures from zombifying the city!

programme.title: High School Mystery Club #9
programme.desc: 5 female celebrities get together to find out the truth of the death of a student in a high school. More hidden secrets of the school are revealed as they solve the case bit by bit..

programme.desc: 5 female celebrities get together to find out the truth of the death of a student in a high school. More hidden secrets of the school are revealed as they solve the case bit by bit..

programme.title: Bros on Foot #5
programme.desc: The 4 actors will go on a road trip on behalf of the youth who have spent the past few years at home. The crew will visit New Zealand and complete missions to win vacation tickets and gifts for youth.

programme.desc: The Skip Dating is a speed dating reality show featuring 4 males and 4 females. As they meet, they will be given the option to press the skip button and switch to a new partner.
